example.text: Congressman Kim's Statement on Wednesday's Debt Ceiling Vote "This entire process was a disaster. I ultimately decided to vote yes because default would be catastrophic for our nation, but what McCarthy did to weaponize the debt ceiling and hold our nation hostage was among the most reckless actions I've seen a political leader take.
